scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Emily
scrape.text: I found the storyline hard to stomach and the characters pretty repugnant for the most part, but I read the book in one sitting and found myself thinking how much fun a story like this would have been to write--just the sheer twisting and turning, plus the delightful use of a fancy dinner to showcase personalities of the characters and as a setting was brilliant. Definitely enjoyed this more than Gone Girl or other books of the ilk because of the author's writing style, but the plot left me feeling sad for humanity.
